channel.title: Do I put it in the gateway or workstation?
channel.description:
When installing services, such as web/db services, do those go on the workstation or gateway?
are there certain things that should be installed on one vs the other?

item.title: Do I put it in the gateway or workstation?
item.dc:creator: mrT
item.description:
great, thank you! So I guess that means I can scale memory way back on the Gateway side and give most of the memory to the Workstation?

item.title: Do I put it in the gateway or workstation?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Donâ€™t use Whonix-Gateway for anything but upgrades and configuring Tor
and bridges. Unless you know what you are doing and/or found that in
Whonix documentation. Everything else belongs into workstation(s).
